# AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.before

**Case**

An alignment that positions lines at the top of the block progression direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case before
```

## Discussion

Aligns lines to the top for English captions, for example.

## Display alignments

- **AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.center**: An alignment that positions lines in the middle of the block progression direction.
- **AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.after**: An alignment that positions lines at the bottom of the block progression direction.
